import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import ScheduleItem from './ScheduleItem'; import './SchedulePage.css' import PlannerWeather from './PlannerWeather' import Transport from './Transport' import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import ExpenseCalculationAndSupplies from "./ExpenseCalculationAndSupplies"; function SchedulePage() { const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const openModal = () => setIsModalOpen(true); const closeModal = () => setIsModalOpen(false); const [WeatherModalOpen, setWeatherModalOpen] = useState(false); const openweatherModal = () => setWeatherModalOpen(true); const closweatherModal = () => setWeatherModalOpen(false); const [TransportModalOpen, setTransportModalOpen] = useState(false); const openTransportModal = () => setTransportModalOpen(true); const closTransportModal = () => setTransportModalOpen(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); const goToC = () => { navigate("/cal"); } //모달창 데이터 저장 const getDayOfWeek = (dateString) => { const date = new Date(dateString); const days = ["일", "월", "화", "수", "목", "금", "토"]; const dayOfWeek = date.getDay(); return days[dayOfWeek]; }; const [data, setData] = useState([]); const addData = (newData) => { newData.index = data.length + 1; newData.day = getDayOfWeek(newData.startday); setData((prevData) => [...prevData, newData]); }; useEffect(() => { console.log(data); // data 배열의 최신 값을 출력 }, [data]); return (
